title.rendered: Allison Mathis’ Casting on Basketball Wives: Rejected By Chris Bosh!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Allison Mathis, the baby mama of NBA star Chris Bosh, was all set to replace Royce Reed on the inaccurately titled reality show Basketball Wives.

But Chris was reportedly PISSED when he heard that producers were in talks to bring in Mathis and moved quickly and strongly in order to nix that idea.

Chris was so bent on preventing her from blabbing about him and their daughter on TV that producers decided she wasn’t worth the headache.

BASKETBALL NON-WIFE: Allison Mathis and Chris Bosh are not married. Nor are they even an item anymore. Nor will she be talking about it on TV, thanks to him.

Basically, with Mathis out of the picture, Royce Reed is likely to stay on, barring any last-minute change, and free to trash Dwight Howard for another year.

If only Chris Bosh and his Miami Heat teammates could close out games the way he finished off Allison Mathis’ chances of reality stardom. Chokers.
